title: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 01: Action Kamen vs. Haigure Maou
original_name: 映画 クレヨンしんちゃん　アクション仮面ＶＳハイグレ魔王
opening_song: "Orawa Ninkimono (オラはにんきもの)" by Akiko Yajima
ending_song: "Boku wa Eien no Okosama (僕は永遠のお子様, I am an Eternal Child) by Mew (Miyuki Kajitani)
sinopse:
By finding a rare Action Kamen card, Shinnosuke Nohara and his family end up being chosen to go to a parallel world and help foil an alien invasion that is occurring over there.

(Source: ANN)
